title: Build Checkpoint Manager Script
description: Develop scripts/checkpoint-manager.py for fast checkpoint creation, diff, and restore operations. Essential for managing state during complex task breakdowns and long-running operations.
notes: Functions: create_checkpoint(), list_checkpoints(), diff_checkpoint(), rollback_to(). SHA-256 hashing for integrity. Checkpoint operations in milliseconds. Critical for safe task breakdown operations that may need rollback.
assumptions: Compression using gzip for space efficiency
Metadata includes task state at checkpoint time
decision_rationale: Checkpoints provide safety net for complex operations and enable experimentation without risk. Fast operations reduce overhead.
